casebody.data: In the Matter of Gregory Xavier HESTERBERG. No. D-2982. Supreme Court of the United States July 17, 2017. Gregory Xavier Hesterberg, of Garden City, New York, having requested to resign as a member of the Bar of this Court, it is ordered that his name be stricken from the roll of attorneys admitted to the practice of law before this Court. The Rule to Show Cause, issued on June 12, 2017, is discharged.
